title: Multi-file Style Program
description:
Implement a program that demonstrates multi-file organization by declaring functions at the top (header style), defining them below (source style), and using them in main. Compute sum and product of two numbers.

Detailed Steps:
1. At top, declare int sum(int a, int b); int product(int a, int b);
2. Below declarations, define sum and product functions.
3. In main, call sum(10,5) and product(10,5), print "Sum: %d\n" and "Product: %d\n".

Input: None.
Expected Output: Sum: 15\nProduct: 50\n
